channel.title: A great learning experience. [C++][DoD]
channel.description:
This video looks at programming in a light that may be unfamiliar to some. It takes reality into perspective. When a lot of introductory programming classes start off with the Object oriented approach, you begin to think that is the best way. It is an hour and a half long, so be sure to give yourself time (:
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rX0ItVEVjHc[/youtube]
